Kankurō has [[Karasu]] tackle the opponent, breaking its own body apart in the process. Kankurō then uses the puppet parts to deliver a series of swift strikes to the opponent, after which Karasu picks the target's body up and carries them through the air, with the finishing blow being a strong slam into the ground.
